item.title: WATCH: Skier survives after triggering avalanche in Canadian Rockies
item.description: Video captures the heart-stopping moment the mountainside gives way during the backcountry run.

item.title: WATCH: Investigation underway after NASA jet's fiery hard landing in Texas
item.description: The jet's landing gear appears to fail before the aircraft skids on its belly across the runway with flames trailing behind it.

item.title: WATCH: Mayor survives RPG assassin attempt in Philippines
item.description: Security cameras captured the moment suspects launched an RPG attack on a mayor in the Philippines, striking his SUV on the street. The mayor is OK, b...

item.title: Amazon to reduce workforce by 16,000, company says in email to staff
item.description: Amazon has been "working to strengthen our organization by reducing layers."

item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Stephen Miller says CBP may not have followed protocol
item.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.
